page.description: The {TOOLCAPTION} causes the dialog to display a special half height title bar when the dialog is configured as a toolbar. NOTE: To configure a dialog to display as a toolbar, the dialog must be modeless, and must include the {DOCKABLE} command. If the dialog is configured as a standard modal dialog (i.e. it is displayed using the ui_dlg_box() function), then the {TOOLCAPTION} command turns off the red X button in the title bar.
